title: Project-Based Learning to Investigate Retinal Aging Changes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biological structures and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Exploring retinal aging mechanisms in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, performing simplified real-world research case projects

learning_goals: Explaining the major structural layers of the retina (e.g., RNFL, RPE) and age-related changes
Completing a project comparing retinal thickness changes using simple image analysis tools
Collaborating with team members to visualize age-related retinal change patterns and present key findings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
